Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=30 µM);Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC>100 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Expressed by the skin dorsal glands.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides with atypical structural features from the skin of the Japanese brown frog Rana japonica.
Literature.Author: Isaacson T, Soto A, Iwamuro S, Knoop FC, Conlon JM.
